forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 47. West northwest wind 5 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 56, with temperatures falling to around 54 in the afternoon. North northwest wind 5 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
As the night settles over Downtown San Francisco, a gentle veil of partly cloudy skies blankets the city, casting a serene, muted glow over its iconic landmarks. The air feels cool and crisp, with a low temperature settling around 47 degrees, a reminder of the winter chill typical for this time of year. A westerly breeze meanders through the streets, carrying with it whispers of the coastal fog that drapes the Golden Gate Bridge. Tonight, the atmosphere is remarkably clear, though there are hints of a marine layer gathering, almost as if the city is still awake, swathed in a soft haze.

With Saturday promising mostly sunny skies and highs near 56, expect a gradual warming that invites a sense of tranquility. The light north-northwest wind will persist, gently nudging the day forward. Ideal attire would be layers; a light sweater or jacket will serve well as you venture to explore the neighborhood. Consider visiting local cafes, where the aroma of fresh brews mingles with the refreshing breeze. Or perhaps stroll along the Embarcadero, where the soothing sound of lapping waves provides a perfect backdrop for contemplation. Whichever way your day unfolds, San Francisco offers a peaceful embrace beneath its cloudy yet inviting skies, fostering a sense of quiet contentment.
